feed.title: Hungry Scientist Xu Yang
feed.subtitle: Stay curious && Keep hard working ------ Witness of personal growth

entry.title: The first Blog
entry.content: I am a forgetful guy who always forgot something books knowledges i have read or learned few weeks ago. I tried to note down all the important stuffs in a notebook. However, it is hard to search something or arrange and edit the handwriting notes. So i find out that electronic note is maybe a good alternative. It is not only easy to arrange and check, but also easy to share and discuss some specific topics with foreign people all around the world. So WHY NOT TRY IT!
